author: andschwa
body: This all should  just work,  but we should do Pester tests for a few important edge cases.    Console.WriteLine   System.Environment   System.Reflection   System.Math    note   Environment   GetEnvironmentVariable  Path   returns nothing in linux, but returns the path in windows.      math .GetMethods    ****Note  System.Environment isn't available in .net core... title: Add tests for using .NET directly
